Our Focus Areas

At LokumAI, we aim to make modern AI solutions accessible to everyone. Discover the technologies and methodologies that power our artificial delight.

Core Technologies

🤖

Intelligent Chatbot Infrastructure

Building robust, flexible, and OpenAI-compatible backend APIs and user interfaces for sophisticated conversational AI systems.

OpenAI Compatible FastAPI React
🧠

Large Language Models (LLMs)

Harnessing the power of LLMs for various applications, from conversational AI to complex reasoning and natural language understanding.

GPT Models Hugging Face Fine-tuning
🛠️

AI Agents & Agentic AI

Developing systems where AI agents can autonomously perform tasks, make decisions, and interact with external tools and services.

LangChain LangGraph Tool Calling
🔄

Model Context Protocol (MCP)

Standardizing context and data flow between AI models with MCP, and building adapters for seamless integration across different AI systems.

MCP Protocol Adapters Integration
🔍

Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG)

Enhancing LLM responses by dynamically retrieving and incorporating information from external knowledge bases and documents.

Vector Search Knowledge Base Context Injection
🔗

Embeddings & Vector Databases

Utilizing embeddings for semantic search and similarity matching, powered by efficient vector databases for high-performance AI applications.

Embeddings Vector DB Similarity Search

Technology Stack

🐍 Backend & APIs

Python & FastAPI Primary backend framework
OpenAPI Standards API documentation & compatibility
PostgreSQL Robust data persistence
MongoDB Document storage

✨ Frontend & UI

React & Next.js Modern frontend framework
TypeScript Type-safe development
TailwindCSS Utility-first styling
Responsive Design Mobile-first approach

Our Development Principles

🌐

Open-Source First

Committing to open-source principles to foster collaboration and innovation

🔌

API Standards

Following OpenAPI and industry standards for maximum compatibility

⚡

High Performance

Optimizing for speed and efficiency in all our AI solutions

👩‍💻

Developer Joy

Creating tools that bring delight to the development experience
